connection_failed.title: Connection to Unraid Server Failed
connection_failed.description:
Failed to connect to Unraid server at {host}:{port}.

Error: {error}

**Troubleshooting Steps:**
1. Verify the Unraid server is running
2. Check the host and port are correct
3. Ensure the Unraid Management Agent daemon is running
4. Check firewall settings
5. Verify network connectivity

Click Submit to acknowledge this issue.

disk_smart_errors.title: Disk SMART Errors Detected
disk_smart_errors.description:
Disk **{disk_name}** has {smart_errors} SMART errors.

SMART Status: {smart_status}

**Recommended Actions:**
1. Back up important data immediately
2. Run a full SMART test
3. Consider replacing the disk
4. Monitor disk health closely

Click Submit to acknowledge this issue.

disk_high_temperature.title: Disk High Temperature Warning
disk_high_temperature.description:
Disk **{disk_name}** temperature is {temperature}°C (warning threshold: {threshold}°C).

**Recommended Actions:**
1. Check cooling/airflow in the system
2. Verify fan operation
3. Consider adding additional cooling
4. Monitor temperature trends

Click Submit to acknowledge this issue.

disk_critical_temperature.title: Disk Critical Temperature
disk_critical_temperature.description:
Disk **{disk_name}** temperature is {temperature}°C (critical threshold: {threshold}°C).

⚠️ **URGENT - Immediate action required!**

**Recommended Actions:**
1. Consider spinning down the disk immediately
2. Check cooling/airflow in the system urgently
3. Verify all fans are operational
4. Improve ventilation or add cooling
5. Back up important data as a precaution

Click Submit to acknowledge this issue.

array_parity_invalid.title: Array Parity Invalid
array_parity_invalid.description:
The Unraid array parity is invalid.

Array State: {array_state}

**Recommended Actions:**
1. Run a parity check to identify issues
2. Review system logs for errors
3. Check disk health status
4. Consider rebuilding parity if necessary

Click Submit to acknowledge this issue.

parity_check_stuck.title: Parity Check May Be Stuck
parity_check_stuck.description:
Parity check is at {sync_percent}% and may be stuck.

**Recommended Actions:**
1. Check system logs for errors
2. Monitor progress for changes
3. Consider pausing and resuming the check
4. Check disk health status

Click Submit to acknowledge this issue.
